metadata.title: CVE-2017-12867 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The SimpleSAML_Auth_TimeLimitedToken class in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.14 and earlier allows attackers with access to a secret token to extend its validity period by manipulating the prepended time offset.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
